Text.Name: GongDengXian
Text.Title: Ascension Law
Text.Desc: This kind of Laws connect you to the ways of immortals directly, allowing you to ascend to immortality.

Text.Name: GongYuanShen
Text.Title: Primordial Spirit Law
Text.Desc: This kind of Laws allow you to eventually reach the State of Primordial Spirit.

Text.Name: GongJinDan
Text.Title: Golden Core Law
Text.Desc: This kind of Laws can eventually lead to the Shaping of Golden Core.

Text.Name: GongFanSu
Text.Title: Worldly Law
Text.Desc: This kind of Laws are quite ordinary, not even enough for Core Shaping.
